Description.Text: Cristal Porto Hotel is located in the heart of Porto, near the Igreja da Lapa and the Avenida dos Aliados, the avenue that is considered the living room of Porto. This avenue is the location of grand buildings and monuments, the link with Douro River and the Atlantic Ocean. Designed with costumer comfort and refinement in mind, this hotel offers guestrooms equipped with air-conditioning, TV, telephone, Wi-Fi internet access, safe box and minibar. The hotel features a restaurant, lounge bar, 2 meeting rooms, and private car parking.
